attributes.action: That the government should call for an immediate ceasefire in Afghanistan and all party peace talks
attributes.additional_details: Operation 'Enduring Freedom' has endured for 10 years, longer than World Wars l & ll together. The cost in human suffering has been immense and Afghanistan is no freer than when the war started. All agree there is no military solution so what is needed is an immediate ceasefire, all party peace talks and a withdrawal of all foreign troops in order to allow Afghanistan to rebuild with the support of the world community and for all its refugees to return. The British government should take a positive lead in initiating this process
